title: Rune (Easy) [1:42:18] (RTA)
description: This game is basically 3rd person Viking Unreal, and it's quite fun. There's a segmented run of the game which is how I learned it, and it completes the game in 1:36:09. He doesn't use save hovering, I don't think he knew about it. He also didn't use dodging, which makes you move quite a bit faster. So I think I'll be able to beat the segmented time if I do all those things. Pretty fun run!
